data.title: Can Disney be a gaming company again?
data.meta_description: Can Disney be a gaming company again?. Mobile marketing and advertising, freemium monetization strategy, and marketing science. Mobile Dev Memo.
data.meta_site_name: Mobile Dev Memo by Eric Seufert
data.text:
Bloomberg reports that Disney may be considering a return to the games publishing business, possibly through a major acquisition. From its coverage (emphasis mine): Iger’s deputies are pushing him to consider a bolder transformation of Disney from gaming licensee to gaming giant through, say, an acquisition of Electronic Arts. But, as with everything else, he’s […]
